item.title: Bravo Apple juice Cider
item.author: henrik.4e@gmail.com (Henrik Andersson)
item.description: I got interested to brew a hard cider to this midsummer. I found that someone had success to brew a cider on a specific store bought apple cider (Bravo Ã¤ppel juice) available here in Sweden. So this is my go at that. The docket on the juice package told me that there are 9.5g sugar per 100ml. This means 95g per liter and that would give me a cider with approximated ABV of 5.

item.title: C01 - Bravo apple juice cider
item.author: henrik.4e@gmail.com (Henrik Andersson)
item.description: This post will be updated with a log of my journey brewing the a Bravo apple juice hard cider using the reciepe mentioned in post blog post. #chart_container { position: relative; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; } #chart { position: relative; left: 40px; } .rickshaw_graph .x_tick .title { bottom: -24px; left: -18px; } #y_axis { position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; width: 40px; } $.
